forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine early followed by mostly cloudy skies this afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies this morning will give way to occasional showers during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
